DOC.brief_summary: Healing anal fistulas in Crohn's patients with an anal fistula plug.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Crohn's Fistula Using a Porcine Intestine Submucosa Graft
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the Surgisis anal fistula plug is effective in healing anal fistulas in patients diagnosed with Crohn's Disease.
DOC.criteria: Patient is diagnosed with Crohn's Disease Patient has a chronically draining anal fistula of Crohn's origin Patient is 18 years old or older Patient has signed an informed consent Patient is pregnant or lactating Patient has perianal drainage with originates from outside the anorectal tract
